a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Income inequality: Gini coefficient before and after tax, 1999 to 2021
Inequality is measured here in terms of the Gini coefficient of income before taxes on the x-axis, and after taxes
Average annual change in before tax
Average annual change in after tax
Data source: OECD Income Distribution Database (2023)
